title: I keep getting randomly disconnected throughout the game
body: So I'm playing a game, and every 2 or 3 minutes it says that I'm attempting to reconnect. My internet is fine and I play on mac so I don't have to worry about IP helper. Anyone have any ideas on how to fix this?

replies.body: Even though your internet is fine, you can still run into problems reaching specific servers.  For your specific issue, there seems to be some instability keep you connected to the game server.  My recommendation would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix!  Test it in a custom game though, to prevent any penalties.
